title: Vingegaard Shuts down Season with Fatigue and Family Priorities, Evenepoel Reboots for Euros, Worlds
content:
Paths diverge for Tour de France toppers: Evenepoel logs huge training miles ahead of end-of-season assault, Vingegaard calls time on 2024.

Read the full article at Vingegaard Shuts down Season with Fatigue and Family Priorities, Evenepoel Reboots for Euros, Worlds on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
